attributes.action: raise the age of consent and drinking to 21
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
raising the age of consent to 21 could help lower unwanted pregnancies, cut back binge drinking and stop peadophiles from targeting children. 
young people have limited knowledge of sex etc. and are therefore unable to decide their gender bias and this leads to abuse and sexual predetors
